sentences.sContent: Generally speaking, periphrasis can be defined, as the substitution of longer, multi-word expressions for single words.
sentences.sContent_eng: Generally speaking, periphrasis can be defined, as the substitution of longer, multi-word expressions for single words.
sentences.sCn: 一般而言，迂回表达可以定义为以多词表达代替单个词的用法。

trans.tranOther: the use of  auxiliary  words instead of  inflect  ed forms
